TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `Command` event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object is clicked.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> class is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.HandleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to access information about the event that was raised.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> constructor.
For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: public DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem item, object commandSource, System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs originalArgs);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem item, object commandSource, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs originalArgs) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that generated the event.
The original event data that contains the and properties.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> class.
> [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs> class.
|Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A>|The value of the `item` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The value of the `commandSource` parameter.|

Docs.summary: Gets the control that raised the event.
Docs.value: The control that raised the event.

Docs.summary: Gets the object that contains the control that raised the event.
Docs.value: The object that contains the control that raised the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem> object. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.PagerField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the pager field object that contains the control that raised the event. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.Pager%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
